q: 1. According to the context provided, what is observed about the electronic music's genre-specific style when transferring styles?
options: A) The style completely changes and losries lose their original feel.
B) The model maintains genre-specific style consistency while preserving rhythmic content. ✅ (correct answer: B)
C) All genres blend into a uniform, non-distinctive sound.
D) Only classical music retains its distinct characteristics after the transfer process.
